## EmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPlugin class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Webpack plugin that generates a file with the list of embedded dependencies and their licenses.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default class EmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPlugin implements WebpackPluginInstance 
```
**Implements:** WebpackPluginInstance

[apply(compiler)](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.embeddeddependencieswebpackplugin.apply.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** Webpack plugin apply method. This method is called by the webpack compiler to apply the plugin, however it not usually needed to be invoked manually by the developer in a webpack configuration. However, if you are calling this plugin (applying it from another plugin) you can call `plugin.apply(compiler)` to apply the plugin and invoke it.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
